Welcome!

I am Damilola Oduronbi;
A Frontend Developer and UX Designer with over 6 years experience buiding usable digital products.

I currently Lead the software development team at TalentUp Africa and also Mentor at MentorCruise.
Previously, I worked at Guaranty Trust Bank, Nigeria as a UX Design Consultant and as a Creative Strategist (UX Designer) at Konga Online Shopping Ltd.

Recent Projects

TalentUp Africa

A Recruitment-tech company focussing on developing a platform to make recruitment easier for both job-seekers and employers...
https://talentup.africa

DudzMobility Self-Service app

An Automobile company seeking for ways to service its customers in the best way possible through simple self-service apps...
http://apps.dudzmobility.com
